description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 23/02399 (Enlargement of 9no. self-contained studios at lower ground and upper ground floors (Class C3) through amalgamation with adjacent bedsits (sui generis) and communal areas, and a lightwell infill extension at lower ground floor. Creation of 1no. additional studio (Class C3) at lower ground floor through conversion of communal areas. Creation of 1no. additional studio (Class C3) at first floor through conversion of two bedsits (sui generis) including rear extensions, external alterations and associated works) for internal alterations to layout including: Unit LG3 - Additional communal area added to entrance and kitchen layout amended, Units LG7 and LG8 - Kitchen locations amended, bathroom location also amended to LG7, Units G2 and G6 - Entrance door and bathroom locations altered to take into account level changes and provide fire lobby, Unit 1.7 - Entrance lobby added following advice from fire consultant.***WITHDRAWN***
